body_html:
I reverted removing of std::nth_element and std::sort. Changing the comparator solves the problem.

The only reason I had removed std::nth_element and std::sort and used std::stable_sort was because of the test, and that problem is solved now after changing the comparator.
body_text:
I reverted removing of std::nth_element and std::sort. Changing the comparator solves the problem.
The only reason I had removed std::nth_element and std::sort and used std::stable_sort was because of the test, and that problem is solved now after changing the comparator.
body:
I reverted removing of `std::nth_element` and `std::sort`. Changing the comparator solves the problem.

The only reason I had removed `std::nth_element` and `std::sort` and used `std::stable_sort` was because of the test, and that problem is solved now after changing the comparator.
